videos.headline: Akron takes blocked punt to the house for TD
videos.description: Akron's Michiah Burton blocks Bowling Green's punt and Gavin Blunt takes to the ball to the end zone for a touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Akron takes blocked punt to the house for TD) 2020/05/20 ESHEET
